hint.throw: Press &control.invoke to toss the continuation trap
hint.captureThrown: Press &control.invoke again to capture a continuation from there
hint.modify:
&control.verbModify&control.verbSpaceModify&control.modify to change the capture radius.
Current radius: &radius

msg.gameErrored: The game ran into a problem that it couldn't handle, and now it needs to be restarted.
msg.gameErrorDetails: You can search for the error online:
msg.move: Use &control.move to move and &control.jump to jump
msg.climb: You can hold &control.climb and move to climb up a ladder
msg.firstDoor:
To open the door, you will need to press
and hold the button...
if only you could do that...
msg.button: Buttons trigger things while they are pressed
msg.variable:
This is a variable.
Aim with &control.aim and
&control.verbInteract&control.verbSpaceInteract&control.interact to grab it.
These will be very useful!
msg.throwable: You can &control.verbThrow&control.verbSpaceThrow&control.throw to throw the variable again -- the blue line shows where it will go.
msg.firstContinuation:
That [green]green[/green] thing you are holding? It's a [special]continuation![/special]
Press &control.invoke to invoke it.
msg.firstTrap:
With that [blue]blue[/blue] device, you can capture your own continuations!
Don't be shy -- grab it!
msg.firstChallenge: There are a lot of race condition bugs... you'll have to use continuations to get around them.
msg.noMoreHelp: There are more bugs, but I can't help you with them. Good luck!
msg.fellOut:
Well, now you're in a pickle...
Continuations are your friend!
